messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Hey, hey, let me show off my bug
Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I’m not going to be able to explain
the charms of bug Pokémon this way!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Bug Pokémon grow quickly, and they do
stuff like poison and paralyze, and they’re cute and yet cool.You gotta believe me. They’re good!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
So, listen. Tell me you’ve grown to
like bug Pokémon since we last met?
